ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 227
ygData.msgSnippet: Ogres are very particular as to who they deal with. My agnostic dark elf enchanter they will not deal with after alliance, though I have not tried it with
ygData.messageBody:
Ogres are very particular as to who they deal with. My agnostic dark elf
enchanter they will not deal with after alliance, though I have not tried it
with benevolance as I usually just cast Illusion: Ogre when in Oggok, the
exception to this being Clurg (he is a smart ogre after all). Faction on the
dark side is much more intricate than it is for light races.

Lozi, ~Hand of Chaos~, CT
>
> I got my stein at level 12 (as a high elf enchanter) by doing the quest.
I
> was able to use illusion dark elf and alliance to get into Oggok and get
the
> stein. However, on a recent trip at level 16 I used illusion dark elf and
> although I didn't get killed no one would deal with me even using
alliance.
> I got a message to the effect of "enchanters aren't welcome here." I
think
> they might have changed some things to make getting the stein harder.
> Either that or I did something to ruin my faction with every Ogre in the
> city (cept for the banker fortunately).
>
